description:
Postagram turns your iPhone, Instagram, Facebook & Dropbox photos into beautiful postcards delivered by mail! Perfect for the holiday season!

PEOPLE LIKE US: (Postagram has been featured in Newsweek, NYTimes, USA Today, CNN, Gizmodo, TechCrunch, LA Times, Better Homes & Gardens, WSJ & more!)

“I highly recommend this app to anyone that loves sharing memories with friends and family while on the go.” - KneelbeforeZod99

"Super easy to use and a wonderful way to surprise people!" -Tmompfamos

"It's inexpensive and saves so much time!" -LeLe5646

“I downloaded it initially because I was finding it ever harder to find shops on 
the road that carry postcards anymore.” - Kelly Charette

"I use this as a thank you card for when I have guest speakers!” -Holstermaker

“Easy to use, great for sending fun pictures to my daughter at camp.” - Wendy Gronich

WHAT YOU GET:
- Printed on thick, glossy photo postcards at 300dpi resolution 
- Personalized with a profile photo of the sender 
- Delivered anywhere in the US for 99¢ & $1.99 for addresses outside of the US (price includes postage) 
- Delivered to the US, Europe & Canada in only 2-5 business days. Other international destinations can take up to 2 or 3 weeks. 
- Include an optional message 
- Photo pop-outs of the postcard as a 3x3 inch photo print (so you can keep it forever)
- You can select a photo from your iPhone Photo Album, Facebook, Instagram, Dropbox, and other cloud services or take one within the app

SO MANY REASONS TO SEND POSTAGRAMS:
- Holiday Cards
- Thank you's 
- I Love You notes 
- Vacation postcards 
- Birthday cards 
- Invitations, wedding, & baby announcements 
- Prints of favorite photos 
- Pen pals 
- Just because…

A FEW MORE REASONS:
Send your first Postagram in less than one minute. Download this free app now and send a beautiful Postagram to someone you love. 

Each Postagram is backed by the Sincerely.com Guarantee: If your Postagram gets lost in the mail, damaged or you are otherwise not happy, we will send another Postagram free or return your money. We take full responsibility from the time you click "order" until you are holding a beautiful Postagram in your hand. 

CONTACT US: 
Visit our website at: http://www.postagramapp.com 
Email us anytime at: team@sincerely.com 
Call us 9am-6pm PST M-F at: 888-260-4005 
Find us on twitter at: twitter.com/postagram
releaseNotes:
We now support iOS 8, iPhone 6, and iPhone 6 Plus!

Our app is stronger, faster, and more responsive. It’s now even easier to send gifts to your loved ones!
